meanings.sent1: She is the freckliest girl in our class.
meanings.sent2: The boy with the freckliest face won the freckle contest.
meanings.sent3: The freckliest puppy in the litter was named 'Spot'.
meanings.sent4: Her freckliest smile lit up the room.
meanings.sent5: The freckliest sky I've ever seen was on a sunny day at the beach.

meanings.definition: In a manner that is most freckled.
meanings.sent1: She smiled freckliest when she saw her favorite dessert.
meanings.sent2: The garden bloomed freckliest in the spring.
meanings.sent3: He danced freckliest when the music played.
meanings.sent4: The stars shone freckliest on a clear night.
meanings.sent5: The paint splattered freckliest on the canvas, creating a unique pattern.
